plugin_info.plugin_description: Import the HOBBES network to Hydra
plugin_info.plugin_epilog: Written by Stephen Knox stephen.knox@mancheser.ac.uk (c) Copyright 2015, University of Manechster. For more information visit www.hydraplatform.org

arg.name: Project
arg.help: The ID of an existing project. If no project is specified a new one will be created.

arg.name: server_url
arg.help: Specify the URL of the server to which this plug-in connects.

arg.name: session_id
arg.help: Specify the session ID for the connection. If not specified, the plugin will try to connect based on the credentials it finds in config

arg.name: Include Timeseries Data
arg.help: Retrieve timeseries data from the hobbes server. BEWARE: This is very data intensive and may take a long time.
